text: Results: Local intra-osseous perfusion index was found lower in either ON + or MON group when compared to either ONor SON group, whereas the marrow fat cells number and area were much larger in either ON + or MON group as compared with ONand SON group. The adipogenic differentiation ability of MSCs and PPARÎ³2 expression in either ON + or MON group were elevated significantly as compared with either ONor SON group.
